newsitem.title: USA: Bemis paced by pressure-sensitive materials.
newsitem.headline: Bemis paced by pressure-sensitive materials.

text.p: Bemis Co Inc, reporting higher fourth-quarter earnings and revenue on Thursday, credited its performance to its pressure-sensitive materials business, which posted double-digit sales growth and improved margins.
The improvement also reflected unit volume increases, new products and plant efficiencies, it said.
Bemis said its polyethylene-packaging business had modest sales growth in the quarter. Its profitability was hurt by fluctuations in raw material prices.

In flexibile packaging, the company's coated and laminated business had strong sales growth and improved profitability. The acquisition of Paramount Packaging, announced in the fourth quarter and completed early in 1997, strengthens Bemis' position in the disposable diaper bag and confectionery markets.
Bemis reported fourth-quarter earnings rose to $0.57 a share from $0.51 in the 1995 quarter. Sales advanced to $434.9 million from $399.2 million.
